dialogue.text:
hey, {{username}}.
what's up! haven't seen you for a while!

it's aj! and i'm so glad to see you here on the backend track!
that's the right choice buddy

you pretty much know how it works here – besides, this time you won't have hackatons.
the overall idea is the same – do a push to learn the new topic quickly and then steadily go on the chosen track.

why would you need sql for the backend track?
oh, you will see it yourself soon enough.
Let's go!
